data.name: Chaos Brigade
data.detailed_description:
Lead the Chaos Brigade, a team of fearless space exterminators, in their quest to cleanse the galaxy from the filth of evil alien races.

In this retro-arcade-platform-shooter you will assault drifting spaceships, wipe out the invaders and claim your reward.

But be careful! Your weapons can damage the spaceship you are meant to save and can ultimately cause its destruction!

Kill the aliens, save the spaceship!



  • Action-driven experience: cleanse alien infested spaceships with the exterminator of your choice.
  • Non linear adventure: more than 100 missions to complete and 8 alien races to deal with.
  • Destructible environment: if not careful you might end up destroying the very spaceships you were meant to save.
  • Brutal gameplay: deaths are permanent and a dead exterminator will no longer be accessible for the current game.
  • Low Res Pixelfest!
  • Original synthwave soundtrack.
  • 100% solo-developed game.



Chaos Brigade is a mix between the paranoia of the old classic Xenophobe and the sheer destruction of Broforce.

Be brave. Be determined.

Rule #1: kill all the aliens.
Rule #2: don’t destroy the ship!

data.short_description: Chaos Brigade is an arcade platform-shooter space odyssey where you control a team of six space exterminators and lead them in the ultimate space cleanse. Wipe out the enemies with your arsenal, but don't overdo or you'll risk destroying the spaceships you are meant to save in the first place!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Please note that each character and alien in the game will die a horrible death at the hands (if applicable) of their enemies. Certain alien races enjoy dismembering humans, so many of the spaceships you are demanded to save are bloodstained all over the place. Also, each human will explode in a burst of blood and guts upon death. It is meant to be funny, but please take that into consideration.
